column1: You'll get it right next time.
Don’t' give up yet you can still prevent more fires.
Every wrong answer is an opportunity to learn.
Shame…I thought you would be better than the last chap.
My hat could guess better than you.
I ought to star packing up my belongings at this rate.
Who thought it was a good idea to light a fire in the lumberyard.
I don't know about you but I prefer my food not burnt.
Looks like Yosemite won't be here much longer.
